awards.title: Site of the Day "Rakuten Font Family"
Site of the Day "360 Learning: Convexity"
Communications Award
awards.description: “The team developed and executed the most strategic and comprehensive communications campaign of any team in the competition. They took a holistic approach, starting with a smart branding strategy and the use of analytics of various online and social media platforms to inform their content, channel and audience engagement strategies. From telling compelling stories about the team, the car and their journey, to smartly integrating online and social media with traditional media coverage and high-profile events, to engaging student teams past and present, as well as team sponsors and partners, Green Team Twente met each challenge and told a compelling story about their effort.” - Feedback of the Shell Eco-Marathon Jury

projects.title: Catawiki - Brand Campaign Videos
projects.description:
These four videos were produced in the context of the new brand identity for the online auction website Catawiki. With the animation studio Lobo CX in Sao Paulo we created stories around four objects that were offered on Catawiki's website. 

Vintage Camera: https://vimeo.com/478036309
Antique Ring: https://vimeo.com/478038765
Vintage Scooter: https://vimeo.com/478040205
Sculpture: https://vimeo.com/478042709

Animation Studio: LOBO CX
Music: Antfood
Creative Team: Sam Souen & Daniel Bunde-Peterson

projects.title: Wetransfer - Virtual office
projects.description:
For the Wetransfer Amsterdam office we created a virtual office with the goal to connect colleagues virtually.

Creative Technologist: Luke Vink

projects.title: Crisp Case Film
projects.description:
This case film was made for our client Crisp, an online supermarket that focuses on shortening the supply chain and delivering groceries directly from regional suppliers such as farmers, butchers, and bakers. 

Design: Caroline Busson
Animations: Iana Kossova
Video Edit: Maksim Kuzin
Creative Direction: Daniel Sytsma

projects.title: Karwei Style Studio
projects.description:
This case film was made for our client Karwei promoting their digital interior planning experience - the Karwei Style Studio.

Film & Edit: Maksim Kuzin
Creative Direction: Daniel Sytsma

projects.title: MIND Move Case Film
projects.description:
This case film was made for our client Pon to promote their Mind the city exhibit at the MIND Move Mobility Experience in Amsterdam.

Film & Edit - Maksim Kuzin
Creative Direction: Daniel Sytsma

profile_positions.description:
- Providing guidance and support to the team and removing blockers where needed
- Overseeing daily activities of the design and development team
- Setting up project goals based on internal ambitions and client requirements 
- Scoping/rescoping/descoping projects when conditions change or new requirements come up
- Supporting the CX team in workshop facilitation
- Carrying out risk assessments and dependencies, set up mitigation plans and flag necessary warnings to internal and external stakeholders
- Developing and continuously improving processes and ways of working to ensure time and cost efficiency 
- Educating and advising clients on technical and design-related questions and requests
- Ensuring product and service quality are to company as well as client standards

Clients: Philips, Heineken, ONE.ai

profile_positions.title: Digital & Content Producer

profile_positions.description:
Main responsibilities:
- Acting as advisor for the new team rotation
- Advising on potential social media campaigns and engagement strategies
- Advising on content creation strategy
profile_positions.title: Marketing Advisor

profile_positions.description:
At Green Team Twente I managed different tasks related to marketing and communications. As part of the rebranding team I co-developed a new content strategy as well as a new visual identitiy together with a regional marketing agency. Furthermore, we planned out an integrated rebranding strategy which included all online and offline media channels. My other responsibilities included managing all content on social media including Facebook and Instagram, generating new content in the form of videos, pictures and texts. As part of the Shell Eco-Marathon participation we wrote an extensive marketing execution plan with a detailed social media analysis which won the first prize of the communications award in the Shell Eco-Marathon 2018 competition.

Main responsibilties:
- Content creation for Instagram, Facebook and Youtube (incl. video and photography)
- Writing concepts for new content (incl. social media campaigns)
- Copy writing (for Instagram, Facebook, and Mailchimp Newsletter)
- Writing marketing success reports (incl. social media analysis, engagement analysis)
profile_positions.title: Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description: As part of the German marketing team we are collaborating with German highschools to promote studying in the Netherlands and especially studying at the UT. Since the internationalization process is still ongoing and more and more bachelor studies are reestablished to an English curriculum, we also start to attract more and more German students. My additional responsibilties include answering questions about study requirements, financing options and the program content of the studies. Furthermore, I help out with formalities for international students that just started at the university and need guidance with registering at the municipality, the bank or insurance.
profile_positions.title: Student Officer for Marketing and Communications

profile_positions.description: As student assistant for Dr. Efthymios Constantinides I helped out in the marketing course 'Advanced Topics in Digital Marketing'. I guided students of the course through the assignments and gave feedback on their work. These assignments included data analysis with the IBM Watson program and making use of eye-tracking glasses, which also gave me a chance to get to know digital marketing tools.
profile_positions.title: Student Assistant Master Course Advanced Topics in Digital Marketing

company.name: UTPC - University of Twente Purchasing Conference

profile_positions.company: UTPC - University of Twente Purchasing Conference
profile_positions.title: Strategic Advisor

profile_positions.company: UTPC - University of Twente Purchasing Conference
profile_positions.description:
As general manager of the UTPC 2016 edition my team and I created a successful recruitment and networking event for 150 students and corporates. Since the conference was still in their growing phase, we started at the beginning of our board year with developing a new visual identity with a branding agency. We came out with a cleaner, more sophisticated logo and fully redeveloped our website. 
With known companies like Shell, Covestro, BASF Coatings we created a strong portfolio of companies that were present during the event and could give us professional insights on their work in the field of purchasing and procurement.
profile_positions.title: General Manager
